content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Nov 2018What is the difference between Robinhood and the other robo-advisors that have been reviewed here?I have been hearing a lot about Robinhood and it seems to offer the same services as say, stashaway, but without the fees.Which would you guys recommend for someone that is thinking of starting to invest $100-200 a month.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Vamsi KrishnaLevel 1. FreshieUpdated on 27 May 2019Robinhood is not robo-advisory. It lets u pick and choose publicly traded company stocks. Stashaway is a robo advisory. Which chooses your portfolio based on your risk appetite.0 comments0
